title: IAnnotation.GetArrowHeadSizeAtIndex
description: Gets the arrow head size of the specified leader on this annotation.
signature:

Index
,

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of leader on this annotation

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: TRUE indicates that the document default setting for arrow head size was used, FALSE indicates that the Length, Width, and Height values were specified

returns: True if the method succeeds, false if not
remarks:
The index value is 0-based. Therefore, a valid index value is greater than or equal to 0, but less than the number of leaders on this annotation. Use
IAnnotation::GetArrowHeadCount
to find the number of leaders on this annotation. If the index value is invalid, SOLIDWORKS returns the arrowhead style as -1, and returns an S_FALSE status (COM interface).
Use
IAnnotation::SetArrowHeadSizeAtIndex
to set the arrow head size of a specific leader.
